arStrings.szText: "You started this manhunt for Lorath. Why the sudden change in heart?"
Because the Church is changing. Surely you’ve seen it. What I began as an act of mercy has become an act of sadism.
(scoffs) “Mercy.” You sent a priest to murder Lorath.
I sent a priest to bring him to judgment. Lorath was the one to choose murder, not I.
He earned execution twice over. But even the greatest of sins can be forgiven in a time of need.
